General.Name: Hsin Tai Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Hsin Tai Gas Co., Ltd. engages in the supply of natural gas in Taiwan. It also constructs natural gas transmission system; sells and installs gas meters; and manufactures and sells gas appliances. In addition, the company is involved in the office building rental business. Hsin Tai Gas Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 221, Zhonghua Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
